SubAgent - Class in ex6
The SubAgent class implements the Agent interface and performs subtraction operations on messages received from two subscribed topics, then publishes the result to a third topic.
SubAgent(String[], String[]) - Constructor for class ex6.SubAgent
Constructs a new SubAgent with the specified subscription and publication topics.
subs - Variable in class ex6.IncAgent
Array of subscription topic names.
subs - Variable in class ex6.Topic
List of subscriber agents.
subscribe(Agent) - Method in class ex6.Topic
Adds a subscriber to the list of subscribers.
SubServlet - Class in ex6
The SubServlet class implements the Servlet interface to handle HTTP requests for performing a subtraction operation.
SubServlet() - Constructor for class ex6.SubServlet
Constructs a new SubServlet.
